name: Echo (PC version)
description:
Echo is a game in which you play as a blind man who can locate his environment only by means of the echolocation that the sounds around him produce.

You will have to search for the position of the keys indicated by the strings to access your village. Be careful, you are in a hostile zone.

The game is available in PC version but a VR version also exists at : https://echothegame.itch.io/echovr

The game was made as part of an end of year study project.

!!French game!!
